mapper.insert: insert into t_artworks(artwork_id, artwork_name, create_time, description, date_time, material_id, color_id, artist_id, event_id, collection_id, theme_id) values(#{artworkId},#{artworkName},#{createTime},#{description},now(),#{materialId},#{colorId},#{artistId},#{eventId},#{collectionId},#{themeId})
mapper.select: SELECT artwork_id, artwork_name, create_time, description, date_time, is_del, material_id, color_id, artist_id, event_id, collection_id, theme_id FROM t_artworks WHERE artwork_id != 0 AND is_del = 1

SELECT artwork_id, artwork_name, create_time, description, date_time, is_del, material_id, color_id, artist_id, event_id, collection_id, theme_id FROM t_artworks WHERE artwork_id = #{artworkId} AND is_del = 1
